A new version of [MODIStsp](http://ropensci.github.io/MODIStsp/) (1.3.9) is on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/MODIStsp/index.html) as of today ! 

This version: 

  - Introduces support for the new MCD12Q2 v006 product and removes support for some v005 product no longer available (https://github.com/ropensci/MODIStsp/issues/170); 
  - Fixes a bug preventing correct processing of product MOD14A1 (https://github.com/ropensci/MODIStsp/issues/170)
  - Updates all links to the MODIS products' description web pages
